description: The best cross-country ski trails in the Sudbury Ontario area - difficulty rating from beginner to advanced - groomed for both classic and skating - site of last year's Canadian Masters Championships.  For more information and for a map, click www.onapingfallsnordics.com
directions: 40 minutes north of downtown Sudbury on HWY 144 just past Levack/Onaping - chalet in Windy Lake Provincial Park.
title: Onaping Falls Nordics Ski Club
